servinfo.title: Oil Pump and Oil Pump Chain Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pump and Oil Pump Chain Components

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly from vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation .
Remove timing chain cover. Refer to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation .
Remove LH bank 2nd timing chain. Refer to LH (No.1) Bank 2nd Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation .
Remove 1st timing chain. Refer to 1st Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation .
Remove oil pump drive sprocket, oil pump chain and oil pump all together.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pump and Oil Pump Chain Inspection

s1.ptxt: Install oil pump drive sprocket (2), oil pump chain with oil pump to engine assembly. Tighten oil pump mounting bolts to specified torque.
Install oil pump chain guide (2), and adjust oil pump chain tension as follows:

s2.ptxt: Install oil pump chain guide (1) and hand-tighten oil pump chain guide bolts.
Insert specified thickness gauge between center of oil pump chain guide and chain.
Press hatched part of chain guide (2) to 40 N·m (4.0 kgf-m, 29.0 lbf-ft) in arrow direction.
Tighten oil pump chain guide bolts (1) to specified torque while pressing.

s1.ptxt: Install 1st timing chain. Refer to 1st Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation .
Install LH bank 2nd timing chain. Refer to LH (No.1) Bank 2nd Timing Chain and Chain Tensioner Removal and Installation .
Install timing chain cover. Refer to Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation .
Install oil pans referring to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation .
Install cylinder head covers referring to Cylinder Head Covers Removal and Installation .

Install intake manifold, intake collector and electric throttle body assembly referring to Intake Collector and Intake Manifold Removal and Installation and Electric Throttle Body Assembly Removal and Installation .
Install engine assembly to vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation .
